localised_text.tooltip_text: Auto-generate army. [[col:red]]Not available when Unit Caps setting is enabled[[/col]]

callback_with_context.context_function_id: IsOwned == false && OwnershipProductRequirementList.Any((ownershiplist = OwnershipProductRecordList.Filter(IsOwned == false)) => {ownershiplist.IsEmpty == false && ownershiplist.All(IsFlc)})
CcoRTOwnershipList(List : OwnershipProductRequirementList, Name : Name, IsFree : true)

header.componentleveltooltip: Each spell purchased will reduce the cost of further spells

callback_with_context.context_function_id: IsOwned == false && OwnershipProductRequirementList.All((ownershiplist = OwnershipProductRecordList.Filter(IsOwned == false)) => {ownershiplist.IsEmpty == false && ownershiplist.Any(IsFlc == false) && ownershiplist.All(IsFlc) == false})
CcoRTOwnershipList(List : OwnershipProductRequirementList, Name : Name, IsFree : false)
